casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Donnie Dean SHULAR. No. 274P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. LaToya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of June 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Writ of Certiorari/or Amicus Curiae":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of December 2007."
